about_the_game:
Arkanoid with optic-styled physics and different bonuses.

Lasertrons can be reflected, refracted, decompose into a spectrum of lasertrons, and change their colors. The white lasertrons can destroy blocks of any color, while the color lasertrons can only destroy blocks of the same color. Deactivated lasertrons can't destroy any blocks. Clean the playing field with lasertrons!

There are 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, and Hard.

The game supports two save modes by checkpoints or passed levels.

The demo game distribution includes only 5 levels.

The complete game distribution includes 60 levels.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz with 4 logical CPU cores.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
  • Additional Notes: Steam Offline Mode - unsupported; XInput 9.1.0 for support XBox controller - Optional;
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz with 4+ logical CPU cores.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 2Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
  • Additional Notes: Steam Offline Mode - unsupported; XInput 9.1.0 for support XBox controller - Optional;
